sentence.Network_en: The card is only for Reverend, Pastors and Full - time Seminarian. Valid document is required for application.
sentence.Network_cn: 只限牧师 、 传道及 全日制 神学生申请,申请时需出示相关有效文件.

PerfectNetExp.abs: seminar 研讨会seminarian 神学校学生seminary 学校
～ regionale 总修院seminarian 修生,修士seminary 修道院,修院此词源自拉丁文的「semen 种子」，原意为培养种子的温室。在基督宗.
～ regionale 总修院seminarian 修生,修士seminary 修道院,修院此词源自拉丁文的「semen 种子」，原意为培养种子的温室。在基督宗.

entry.def: A seminarian is a student at a seminary.

means.word_mean: 1. a student at a seminary (especially a Roman Catholic seminary)

auth_sentence.content: I was as romantic a seminarian as any the world over.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was as romantic a seminarian as any the world over.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was as romantic a seminarian as any the world over.

auth_sentence.content: His friend and fellow seminarian, Christopher Deleon from Baltimore, is just hoping they pick the holiest cardinal.
auth_sentence.res_content: His friend and fellow seminarian, Christopher Deleon from Baltimore, is just hoping they pick the holiest cardinal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His friend and fellow seminarian, Christopher Deleon from Baltimore, is just hoping they pick the holiest cardinal.

auth_sentence.content: Once, after supper, my father swept me up into his black seminarian's cape and across the street for Evensong.
auth_sentence.res_content: Once, after supper, my father swept me up into his black seminarian's cape and across the street for Evensong.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Once, after supper, my father swept me up into his black seminarian's cape and across the street for Evensong.
